abstract: Food maker Sara Lee says consumer products giant Procter & Gamble is buying its air care business, Ambi Pur, for $320 million euros, or $470 million.
snippet: Food maker Sara Lee says consumer products giant Procter & Gamble is buying its air care business, Ambi Pur, for $320 million euros, or $470 million.
lead_paragraph: The diversified food company, Sara Lee, said Friday that it would sell its air care business, Ambi Pur, to Procter & Gamble for $470 million.

headline.main: Sara Lee to Sell Air Care Unit to P.&G.
